member.name: T:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentsController
member.summary: Controller class for managing payments in the Payment API.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentsController.#ctor(Payment.API.Data.Repository.IPaymentRepository,AutoMapper.IMapper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PaymentsController class with the specified dependencies.
member.param: An object that implements the IPaymentRepository interface for accessing payment data.
An IMapper object used to map between domain model objects and response/request model objects.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentsController.GetAllPayments
member.summary: Retrieves all payments from the payment repository.
member.returns: A list of PaymentResponseModel objects representing the payments.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentsController.GetPaymentByGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves a single payment with the specified ID from the payment repository.
member.param: The ID of the payment to retrieve.
member.returns: A PaymentResponseModel object representing the payment, or a NotFoundResult if no payment with the specified ID was found.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentsController.AddPayment(Payment.API.Models.PaymentModel.PaymentRequestModel)
member.summary: Adds a new payment to the payment repository.
member.param: A PaymentRequestModel object representing the payment to add.
member.returns: A CreatedAtActionResult object representing the newly created payment, or a BadRequestResult if the request model was invalid.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentsController.DeletePayment(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a payment with the specified ID from the payment repository.
member.param: The ID of the payment to delete.
member.returns: A NoContentResult indicating that the payment was successfully deleted, or a NotFoundResult if no payment with the specified ID was found.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentsController.PutPayment(System.Guid,Payment.API.Models.PaymentModels.PaymentUpdateModel)
member.summary: Updates an existing payment with the specified ID in the payment repository.
member.param: The ID of the payment to update.
A PaymentUpdateModel object representing the updated payment information.
member.returns: A NoContentResult indicating that the payment was successfully updated, or a BadRequestResult if the payment with the specified ID was not found or the payment update model was invalid.

member.name: T:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentWarrantsController
member.summary: Controller for managing payment warrants.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentWarrantsController.#ctor(Payment.API.Data.Repository.IPaymentWarrantRepository,AutoMapper.IMapper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PaymentWarrantsController class with the specified dependencies.
member.param: An object that implements the IPaymentWarrantRepository interface for accessing payment warrant data.
An IMapper object used to map between domain model objects and response/request model objects.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentWarrantsController.GetAllPaymentWarrants
member.summary: Returns a collection of all payment warrants.
member.returns: An ActionResult object containing a collection of PaymentWarrantResponseModel objects, or a 204 No Content response if there are no payment warrants.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentWarrantsController.GetByReferenceNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a payment warrant with the specified reference number.
member.param: The reference number of the payment warrant to retrieve.
member.returns: An ActionResult object containing a PaymentWarrantResponseModel object if the payment warrant is found, or a 404 Not Found response if it is not found.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentWarrantsController.GetPaymentWarrantByGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a payment warrant with the specified GUID.
member.param: The GUID of the payment warrant to retrieve.
member.returns: An ActionResult object containing a PaymentWarrantResponseModel object if the payment warrant is found, or a 404 Not Found response if it is not found.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentWarrantsController.AddPaymentWarrant(Payment.API.Models.PaymentWarrantModel.PaymentWarrantRequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new payment warrant and adds it to the payment warrants repository.
member.param: The payment warrant request model containing the payment warrant data.
member.returns: An ActionResult of PaymentWarrantResponseModel representing the created payment warrant.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentWarrantsController.DeletePaymentWarrantByReferenceNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a payment warrant by its unique identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the payment warrant to be deleted.
member.returns: A NoContentResult if the payment warrant was successfully deleted, otherwise a NotFoundResult.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Controllers.PaymentWarrantsController.DeletePaymentWarrant(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a payment warrant by its unique identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the payment warrant to be deleted.
member.returns: A NoContentResult if the payment warrant was successfully deleted, otherwise a NotFoundResult.
